interactions.user_prompt: Draft a university assignment on 'Automating University Assignments using AI Agents'.

interactions.writer_input: Use the outline to generate detailed content for Introduction.

writer_output.Introduction: The automation of university assignments using AI agents addresses repetitive and time-consuming tasks for students. This project presents a modular system that plans, drafts, and reviews content automatically, ensuring high-quality academic output. The problem of repetitive drafting is solved by the Planner Agent for structured outlines, the Writer Agent for content generation using a fine-tuned LoRA model, and the Reviewer Agent for quality evaluation.

interactions.reviewer_input: Evaluate Introduction for coherence, relevance, style, and grammar.

reviewer_output.feedback: Introduction is clear and logically structured. No grammar issues. Tone is academic and matches assignment expectations.

interactions.writer_input: Generate Methodology section based on outline points.

writer_output.Methodology: The system consists of three main agents. The Planner Agent generates structured outlines from user prompts. The Writer Agent, using a fine-tuned LoRA model, produces high-quality academic content section by section. The Reviewer Agent evaluates drafts using multi-metric criteria to ensure coherence, relevance, style, and grammar. The agents communicate through a modular workflow allowing iterative improvements.

reviewer_output.feedback: Methodology clearly describes the system and workflow. Academic style is well-maintained, and structure aligns with outline.

interactions.writer_input: Generate Results and Conclusion based on evaluation metrics and overall workflow.

writer_output.Results: The AI agent generated a complete draft assignment automatically. Evaluation metrics indicated that all sections were coherent, relevant, and maintained proper academic style. Grammar checks confirmed minimal errors. Iterative review allowed refinements to improve quality.
writer_output.Conclusion: Automating university assignments using AI agents streamlines repetitive academic tasks, reduces human effort, and maintains high-quality outputs. Future work includes integrating external knowledge sources and multi-agent collaboration for advanced assignment automation.

interactions.reviewer_input: Final evaluation of Results and Conclusion.

reviewer_output.feedback: The Results and Conclusion effectively summarize the project outcomes. All sections maintain a consistent academic tone.
